title: Dragon Trainer Teemo [Concept]

embed.description: Support me on Patreon and get awesome rewards! | Weebly | Twitch | Tumblr | Twitter Just a quick and fun concept of Dragon Trainer Teemo. I thought it w...

body:
A fun quick concept for the Skintober prompt today, which was Dragon Trainer. I thought Teemo would be a fun addition to the skin line. Most of his outfit already fit in with the "explorer/trainer" type of look, so it was mostly just color changing and modifications.

This is the main part of his model and outfit here, lots of reds/blues and golds.
https://i.imgur.com/eGwMfkk.jpg

And with the dragon on his back (without the serpent)
https://i.imgur.com/2Odg8q4.jpg

Thank you for looking!
{{champion:17}} 
https://twitter.com/Kairuichan

replies.body: ... is that shroom model what I think it is?
How nice of you to create a skin which is gifting nougat pralines to the enemy. +1

...That one actually took me a moment, before it dawned on me it referred to the metaphorical "to step in it".
_The irony is that it is supposed to mean good luck._ xD

I say "genius"!

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
I saw this on twitter, this is such a great concept :D His little snakey-dragon blowgun is too cute!
Wait... where does Teemo blow it?
Haha! I actually talked a lot about that while I was streaming this particular concept... We'd have to leave this one to Riot if it ever came to light. :^)
It doesn't go well eitherway I guess xD
Teemo needs skins for all themes

It's cute, but I don't think teemo deserves any more skins until kled gets more.
Kled > Teemo
